name: Awen's Dead
description:
NOTE: There is no official ending yet! The game is complete when you collect the 4th fish

Premise

in  Awen's Dead, you play as a young frog in a mysterious land. Who you are, and how you got there, is a mystery. Hopefully by complying with the spirits of this realm, you'll be able to learn more about your past... and your fate

Controls

z/y - Secondary and Interaction Key

x - Primary Key

tab/c - Inventory

Arrow Keys - Movement

Credits (Incomplete):

Berwens Theme - 8-bit Theme - Ted Kerr

Trystans Theme - Good Mood Theme - Wyver9 (Credit)

Awens Theme - Pixel River - Trevor Lentz
